title: Seduce the Count’s Daughter’s Lover - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Empires   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Maids   Marriage of Convenience   Nobles   Past Trauma   Royalty   Second Chance   Time Travel
author: Red Agate   홍마노
description:
I’m Lydel Cross.

When I turned 18 the Emperor trapped me in a magical tower and used me in whatever way he saw fit. That was the life I lived before it was rewound.
In order to be happy during my second chance at life, I decided to turn away from anything related to magic, even becoming the maid of a count. At least, that’s how it was supposed to be…

“You’re the only person I have! Please steal him from Milena! I beg of you!”

Wait a moment, master. The ‘boy’ you want me to pull from her lady wouldn’t happen to be the butler, whose face looks so much like the Emperor’s I can’t get used to it, now would it?

Just looking at his face makes me anxious, and you’re telling me to seduce Graham?

…Will I not be able to live this life quietly either?>
